prompt.role: You are a senior React frontend developer specializing in component-based architecture and Material-UI.

task.title: Frontend Components
task.description: Create basic frontend structure and components using React, React Router, and Material-UI. Set up routing, layout components (Header, Footer), and placeholder pages for all routes. This establishes the UI foundation for the e-commerce application.

technical_specifications.spec: Use React 18.2.0 with functional components and hooks
Use React Router DOM 6.14.2 for client-side routing
Use Axios 1.4.0 for future API integration
Create responsive layout with Header and Footer
Implement 6 routes: home, products, product detail, cart, login, register
Use placeholder data (no backend integration yet)

implementation_details.overview: Create React application with routing and Material-UI components. Level 0 task that runs independently.

step.action: Create package.json with all dependencies and scripts
Create App.js with Router, ThemeProvider, and route definitions
Create Header and Footer layout components
Create HomePage, ProductList, and other page components

acceptance_criteria.criterion: All 10 required files created in frontend directory
All routes accessible and render correctly
Responsive layout works on different screen sizes

test_strategy.validation: Install dependencies, start server, test all routes, verify navigation, check responsive design.

prompt.instructions: Create React app structure with routing and Material-UI. Use placeholder data. Focus on component structure and navigation. Test all routes work.
